channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: In Canada: Diljit Dosanjh to Speak at Billboard Canada Summit at NXNE
item.description: 🎶 Exciting news from the Great White North! Diljit Dosanjh will be taking the stage at Billboard Canada Summit at NXNE! 🇨🇦 #MusicNews #NXNE

item.title: Friday Dance Music Guide: The Week’s Best New Tracks From Sammy Virji & Skepta, Interplanetary Criminal & More
item.description: 🕺🎵 Groove into the weekend with fresh beats from Sammy Virji, Skepta, and more in our Friday Dance Music Guide! #NewMusicFriday #WeekendVibes

item.title: Justin Bieber Shows Off New Pics With Baby Jack: ‘Gonna Be a Good Summer’
item.description: 🌟 Justin Bieber's summer plans just got cuter with baby Jack in the mix! ☀️👶 #SummerVibes #FamilyTime

item.title: Mariah Carey’s ‘The Emancipation of Mimi’: All 18 Original Tracks Ranked for Its 20th Anniversary (Staff Picks)
item.description: 🎉 Celebrating 20 years of @MariahCarey's iconic 'The Emancipation of Mimi' with a definitive ranking! Which track is your favorite? 🎶 #Mimi20 🎵

item.title: MGMT’s Andrew VanWyngarden Returns to Wesleyan, Restages Viral “Kids” Performance
item.description: ✨ Andrew VanWyngarden is back at Wesleyan, bringing back the magic of “Kids”! 🎶 Let’s relive the good vibes together! 🌟 #MGMT #MusicNews
